title: Login error (EUNE)
body:
"Unable to connect to the                             
login queue. Check the server
status here. If it looks good,
follow the guide here"

Do you have any ideas how to fix this? Me and my firends have the same problem.
(we are from Croatia)

replies.body: Nope, I wasn't able to find any issues with our servers.  If your friends are in the same region as you then it's possible that your ISP could be having issues.  If you're all in the same network or room together, then a connection problem failing to reach the authentication server might be the culprit as well.  In this case, you guys will want to try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Otherwise, double check your ISP's support page in case anything might be going down.  I hope that helps!
